name: High income
special_notes: High income group aggregate. High-income economies are those in which 2021 GNI per capita was more than $13,205.

name: Low income
special_notes: Low income group aggregate. Low-income economies are those in which 2021 GNI per capita was $1,085 or less.

name: Middle income
special_notes: Middle income group aggregate. Middle-income economies are those in which 2021 GNI per capita was between $1,086 and $13,205.
